San Francisco school board recall puts Mayor London Breed under huge pressure

Breed likely has a few weeks to select her picks, given that ousted board members Gabriela López, Alison Collins and Faauuga Moliga will continue to serve until 10 days after the Board of Supervisors accepts the results — with appointees taking office Mar. 11 at the earliest. Breed will discuss next steps at a Wednesday morning news conference.
